message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, I'll go up a little, but I'm not giving you more than half.  Let's end this!
You're running out of time, the money is losing value for you!
I'm willing to give you a little more, but this is my final offer. The money is losing value quickly for me, so I need to make sure I get something out of this!
You said that was your final offer, but I'm willing to make one more deal. This is my last offer, take it or leave it!
